remarks: Properties of a word to represent a walk of a fixed length (in an undirected graph).  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 15-Jul-2018.)
statement: iswwlkn $p |- ( ( V e. X /\ E e. Y /\ N e. NN0 ) -> ( W e. ( ( V WWalksN E ) ` N ) <-> ( W e. ( V WWalks E ) /\ ( # ` W ) = ( N + 1 ) ) ) ) $.
